catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Commentaries on the Hebrew Bible
author: Kara, Joseph
description: Contents: Rashi, Commentary on the Hebrew Bible with additions by other authors (Pentateuch, Jeremiah, Ezekiel, Isaiah, Minor Prophets, Five Scrolls, Psalms, Job) (ff. 1r-218r). Joseph Kara, Commentary on Job (ff. 218v-292r). Rashi, Commentary on Proverbs, Daniel, Ezra-Nehemiah and 1 Chronicles (ff. 293r-329v).
